channel.title: Brief Reviews on Bits & Qubits
channel.description: Recent content in Brief Reviews on Bits & Qubits

item.title: Deli (next to where I live)
item.description: This place does not bother with tedious menus and their pesky price tags.

item.title: Mill City Museum (Minneapolis)
item.description: This is no Isabella Steward Gardner Museum or Lotusland; this is not the whimsy of a wealthy socialite. This is better. This is flour.

item.title: Frioul Archipelago (Marseille)
item.description: There I was, at the Old Port of Marseille, staring longingly at an archipelago of islands a distance away.
